markdownRemark.html: Mix everything together, serve on a butter-roasted slice of bread, garnish with a slice of lemon, dill and caviar.

fields.ingredients:
• 250 g färska räkor
  • 1,5 msk majonnäs
  • 1 msk crème fraiche
  • 1/2 tsk dijonsenap
  • 1 knippe finskuren dill
  • 1/4 finhackad rödlök
  • 4 skivor kantskuret vitt bröd

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Mix everything together, serve on a butter-roasted slice of bread, garnish with a slice of lemon, dill and caviar.
